mapper.select: select t1.id ID , t1.industry_name INDUSTRYNAME , t1.industry_type INDUSTRYTYPE , t1.PARENT_CODE PARENTCODE , t1.industry_code INDUSTRYCODE from sys_industry t1 where 1=1 and t1.PARENT_CODE = #{defaultCode}

select t1.id ID , t1.industry_name INDUSTRYNAME , t1.industry_type INDUSTRYTYPE , t1.PARENT_CODE PARENTCODE , t1.industry_code INDUSTRYCODE from sys_industry t1 where 1=1 and t1.PARENT_CODE = #{dto.parentCode} and t1.industry_type='position'

select t1.id ID , t1.industry_name INDUSTRYNAME , t1.industry_type INDUSTRYTYPE , t1.PARENT_CODE PARENTCODE, t1.industry_code INDUSTRYCODE from sys_industry t1 where t1.parent_code = (select s.PARENT_CODE from sys_industry s where s.industry_code=#{dto.industryCode})
select t1.id , t1.industry_name , t1.industry_type , t1.PARENT_CODE , t1.validate_state from sys_industry t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_industry t1 set t1.industry_name =#{dto.industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.industry_type =#{dto.industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.PARENT_CODE =#{dto.parentCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.validate_state ='1' where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete t1 from sys_industry t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update sys_industry t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
